action_item: Data Migration - Collect and move all AI notes to a designated folder on SharePoint.
notes: Ensure that all previously collected AI notes are organized in the new folder.

action_item: Requirements - Walk through data entry process in NextGen with the team.
notes: Focus on field-to-field data entry and business rules for data input.

action_item: Requirements - Review and clarify appointment types to distinguish between billable and non-billable.
notes: Ensure that the system captures the correct information for reporting purposes.

action_item: Reports - Gather feedback on desired dashboard features for managing client assessments.
notes: Collect input from staff on what information is critical for managing cases.

action_item: DrFirst/EPCS - Address configuration issues preventing clinical assistants from updating patient notes.
notes: Investigate why updates made by clinical assistants are not visible to licensed clinicians.

action_item: Service Codes - Review and simplify the billing code selection process in NextGen.
notes: Ensure billing codes are clear and easy to select to reduce errors.
